metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22060 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low.
metadata.Description: In Spring Framework versions 5.3.0 - 5.3.13, 5.2.0 - 5.2.18, and older unsupported versions, it is possible for a user to provide malicious input to cause the insertion of additional log entries. This is a follow-up to CVE-2021-22096 that protects against additional types of input and in more places of the Spring Framework codebase.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
